EnablePlayerAccess.Name: Grant Players access to the overview?
EnablePlayerAccess.Hint: Allows or disallows players to access the Party window to see the stats every player on the current scene, too

EnableTooltip.Name: Enable tooltips?
EnableTooltip.Hint: Enables or disables tooltips when hovering over tokens

EnablePlayerAccessTooltip.Name: Enable tooltips for players?
EnablePlayerAccessTooltip.Hint: Enables or disables tooltips for players, but only for tokens they own.

TooltipFontSizeInPixels.Name: Set the font size for tooltips in pixels.
